promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic serpent psychic-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracegont, a a dynamic basic serpent psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: MAX Burst, Payback. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "psychic" or "Bracegont". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, serpent-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This elusive coil-shape dweller lurks in royal chambers, using mind-bending powers to protect ancient castles. When threatened, it unleashes a mighty mental surge.
